704297f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Ditmas Avenue
704297f-a.text:
(1)
1249 Flatbush Ave., east side, between Ditmas and Newkirk Aves., sho-
ing Cortelyou House, erected about 1820, when it was occupied by S. Cortelyou,.
and later to be moved to 412 East 25th Street.
Prior to 1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
NA( BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, showing another view of the Garret Vanderveer House
alias Cortelyou House. It was erected in 182O by Simon Cortelyou who
wwas the son-in-law of Garret Vanderveer who owned the house in 1842.
